Posts.Content: Jul 21, 2015 06:22PM RSS wrote: I'm 3 years in remission....I agree, I worry about it too...esp when i hear about recurrence of someone... I try to figure out how to beat the odds... I hate the "what ifs" ..hate the uncertainties .. of course positive outlook helps but the whirlwind of thought take over..ITS SCARY !!!!! My son is now 71/2 years old and I want to live long enough to see my grandchildren :) no too ambitious a plan now is it lol? ..... I try to relax ... I "Tap" a lot....do a lot of affirmations and what has helped me also is the bach flower essences esp the rescue remedy and the mimilus essences.... I got it from Whole foods. I think it works... Some how manages to put fear out of my mind....
Posts.Title: Stage 3 anxiety fear of reacurrence Carolehebert RSS
